No it is not. Often HR don't know what they are doing when they write job posts, they just copy and paste a random list of software.
Photoshop, premeiere, illustrator, after effects, and flash are all designer tools. Flash used to be a Frontend development tool but now it's mostly video and animations, no one in their right mind will use it now to develop any kind of Frontend.

Assuming that this is the HR mistake, How does this come from a relatively big company that is essentially built on web ? I mean their website is their most important business!, Is this how tech-industry in Egypt operate ?
